thoughts.text: I think I should use the 'list_files' command to see what files are in the current directory.
thoughts.reasoning: This will give me a good idea of what resources I have available to work with.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'list_files' command
- Review the list of files
- Determine which files are relevant to my current goals
thoughts.criticism: I should have thought of this earlier, as it would have saved me time in determining what resources I have available.
thoughts.speak: I will use the 'list_files' command to see what files are in the current directory.
